post_title: T206 Hall of Famers for Sale, Price Lowered on Evers to $575
post_content:
For Sale (Note can't mail out until 7/3)- All prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  NC residents add 6.5% ST.

Iron Man McGinnity SC 350/30 - PSA 5  $OLD.
Johnny Evers w/Bat SC 350-460/25 (difficult back ranks above EPDG in difficulty)  - PSA 3  Lowered to $575 pp ff.
John McGraw Finger in the Air P150 - PSA 3 $OLD
Vic Willis w/ Bat P 350-460 - SGC 3 $250 $OLD
Fred Clarke Portrait P150 - SGC 4.5  $425 pp ff.  $OLD
Rube Marquard follow through SC 350-460/30 - PSA 4.5  Lowered to $390 pp ff.

Thanks Bob I.
Two sold prices reduced on the remaining.  Thanks for looking.  Bob I.
Price lowered on Clarke one last time a beautiful card.
Another bump, Evers and Marquard left and prices lowered to move.
